resources.string: Solve the quiz to check how well you know the classic Disney animated movies
Rowan Atkinson, best known for his work as Mr. Bean gave his voice to one of these characters. Which one?
Ed, the giggling hyena from The Lion King
Philoctetes, Hercules\' satyr friend and trainer
Cogsworth, the majordomo in Beast\'s castle, from the original Beauty and the Beast animation
What was the name of Jasmine\'s pet tiger?
What was the name of the Emperor changed into a llama in The Emperor\'s New Groove?
Enter the llama king\'s name here
That\'s close but you need to check your spelling :)
Unfortunately that was not the correct answer. Better luck next time!
Choose the names that do NOT belong to any \nof the 7 dwarfs:
A mighty warrior whom Pocahontas\' father chose for her husband
Submit and go to the next question
You have seen some of the Disney classics for sure, but you do not really care about them enough to remember the details. Good news is - there are so many great ones you did not see yet!
You certainly know your Disney classics, but it seems rewatching some of them is in order, have fun!
WOW! You really are an expert on everything Disney, great job!
It seems Disney is not really your thing or you just did not have a chance to see any of the great classics. Why not give it a go?
